Key Match Events: The Mets had a late-inning comeback in Game 1, setting up momentum for Game 2
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets aim to maintain their momentum and take a 2-0 series lead with a win in Game 2
Playing at Citizens Bank Park poses a challenge for the Mets
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series is a best-of-five, with the winner advancing to the NLCS
Game 2 is nationally broadcast on FS1
Others: The game starts at 4:08 p.m. ET
The series schedule includes potential games 3, 4, and 5 if needed
